sentences.en: A snake slithered across the grass.
He slithered down the muddy bank.
sentences.cn: 他在泥泞的河岸上踉踉跄跄地走。

sentences.en: I felt the December air slither down my leg.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到十二月的冷风沿着腿直往下钻.

sentences.en: More often than not , the rattlesnake will slither away in search of a less intimidating foe.
sentences.cn: 多数环境下, 响尾蛇会爬开,去寻找不恁地吓人的猎物.
它们划过时尽显其飘逸之姿.

sentences.en: Tonya screamed when she saw a snake slither across the yard.
sentences.cn: 托雅看见有条蛇爬过院子时高声尖叫了起来.

trans.tran_en: to slide somewhere over a surface, twisting or moving from side to side
